(That was just fine.)

:KitKat:
She wasn't sure if it was a dream or not, but she felt a kiss on her 
lips.  She kissed back.  She hears a voice say good night.  She 
mumled in reply "goodnight."

she curled up in her sheets and felt into a deep sleep.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> DrillBit was enjoying kissing her, when she passed out.
> He cought her, before she collapsed to the floor.
> "Hmmm. I think you need to sleep." He picked her up, and carryed 
her to
> bed. He layed her down, and covered her up. He couldn't help but 
give
> her a deep, long kiss.
> "Good night. I'll see you in the morning." He turned and walked 
out, and
> back to his quorters, where he went to bed.
> 
> OOC: I didn't know what to do. I hope taking her to her bed and 
all, was
> ok.
